required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Predicting the Cumulative Live Birth Rate Further Ovarian Stimulation by Highly Purified Human Menotropin HP-hMG. A Multicentre, Retrospective Study

brief_summary.textblock: French, non-interventional, retrospective, multicentric analysis of patients who have undergone a controlled ovarian stimulation (COS) for in-vitro fertilization (IVF)/ intracytoplasmic sperm injection (ICSI). The main objective is to determine the cumulative live birth rate with highly purified menotropin (HP-hMG) which is defined as the occurrence of live birth per started COS, further to transfer of fresh and frozen embryos generated from the same COS.

primary_outcome.description: Defined as the occurence of live birth per started COS, further to transfer of fresh and frozen embryos generated from the same COS.

secondary_outcome.measure: Initial dose of Menotropin treatment per IVF cycle (IU)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At Day 1 of Menotropin stimulation up to Day 20 of Menotropin stimulation during 2009 to 2016

secondary_outcome.measure: Total dose of Menotropin treatment per IVF cycle (IU)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At Day 1 of Menotropin stimulation up to Day 20 of Menotropin stimulation during 2009 to 2016

secondary_outcome.measure: Total days of Menotropin treatment (per IVF cycle)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to end of the ovarian stimulation treatment (up to 20 days) during 2009 to 2016
secondary_outcome.description: Duration of treatment (in days) with Menotropin of patients will be reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Dose adjustment of Menotropin in IU
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At Day 1 of Menotropin stimulation up to Day 20 of Menotropin stimulation during 2009 to 2016

secondary_outcome.measure: Type of gonadotropin-releasing hormone (GnRH) protocols used for Luteinizing Hormone (LH) surge suppression (with in particular long and short agonist, and antagonist)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At the day of the first GnRH administration during the ovarian stimulation treatment (up to 20 days) in 2009 to 2016
secondary_outcome.description: Gonadotropin-releasing hormone protocols with in particular long and short agonist, and antagonist.

secondary_outcome.measure: Total days of LH surge suppression protocol
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From Day 1 up to the last day of GnRH analogues administration during 2009 to 2016
secondary_outcome.description: Gonadotropin-releasing hormone protocols with in particular long and short agonist, and antagonist.

intervention.description: All directions for medication usage were solely at the discretion of the investigator in accordance with their usual routine clinical practice and are assumed to be consistent with the national prescribing information of the medicinal product in the country in which the study will take place.

study_pop.textblock: Adult women, fitting the inclusion/exclusion criteria, who were prescribed Menotropin during 2009 to 2016 for COS in a treatment of infertility will be included in this study.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patient undergoing a COS with HP-hMG for IVF/ICSI cycle from a French data registry between 2009 to 2016
Exclusion Criteria:
- Ovulation inductions
- Intra-uterine inseminations
- Fertility preservations
- Oocyte donations

eligibility.gender_description: Adult females who underwent COS treatment with Menotropin during 2009 to 2016.
